usageDisclaimer.l: Usage of a JourneyCharter Credential in Abydos may significantly reduce your life expectancy.

issuanceDisclaimer.l: All desiring entrance into Abydos must present credentials issued by the Veniordine.

privacyDisclaimer.l: It is the sole responsibility of Holders as Issuees of a JourneyCharter credential to present that credential in a privacy-preserving manner using the mechanisms provided in the Issuance and Presentation Exchange (IPEX) protocol specification and the Authentic Chained Data Container (ACDC) specification. https://github.com/WebOfTrust/IETF-IPEX and https://github.com/trustoverip/tswg-acdc-specification.
